title: Sentiment Analysis Using R

title: Food Wastage Monitoring System
description: The system integrates smart weighing scales, load cells, and IoT display units for real-time food weight monitoring.

title: Interview Insights
description: Interview Insights  is a Django-based web application designed to facilitate the exchange of firsthand interview experiences among students and job seekers.
